snippet: Maryland shocked the college sports world last November, by announcing a plan to cut eight varsity sports to save money. The doomed programs had a chance to save themselves, through fund-raising, and only one has survived.
abstract: Maryland shocked the college sports world last November, by announcing a plan to cut eight varsity sports to save money. The doomed programs had a chance to save themselves, through fund-raising, and only one has survived.

headline.main: Seven Sports Are Eliminated at Maryland
